title: Echoes: A Play In Two Acts
description: N. Richard Nash Full Length, Drama Characters: 2 male, 1 female Interior Set A young man and woman build a low keyed paradise of happiness within an asylum, only to have it shattered by the intrusion of the outside world. The two characters search, at times agonizingly, to determine the difference between illusion and reality. The effort is lightened by moments of shared love and "pretend" games, like decorating Christmas trees that are not really there. The t
author: N. Richard Nash
